text:
Hi,

on the site http://httpd.apache.org/download.cgi there is an link to an "Win32
Binary (Self extracting)" but this binary doesn´t exist.
creator: chrislenin@web.de

text: *** Bug 37397 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: nick@webthing.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Sorry, binaries are provided on ANY platform as a convinience ONLY!

  However, those reporting this not-a-bug might want to contribute to the solution
  and subscribe to testers@httpd.apache.org, because we announce all packages
  there to be reviewed.  Until three +1's on the msi package are recieved, the
  package isn't released.  It was announced about 21 days ago, and nobody's
  chosen to test it.

  That section of the webpage should be commented out entirely until a package
  is available for download, with this we agree.
